Text: [girl] So, where are you taking me?
[boy] Well, if I tell now, it wouldn't be a surprise, would it?
[laughs] You're a very, very naughty boy.
I can still... kiss you, right?
Now it smells of pig shit.
You been spying on us, you creep?
'Course. Look at her. No one's ever kissed that.
Could she even stand up straight to do it?
Where you going, crooked girl? We can teach you.
I heard your father  makes you sleep with pigs.
Your own family doesn't even want you.
Well, it looks to me  like you portalled in.
From wherever you were to here.
Your backhand is even more impressive than your magic.
[woman] We're not supposed to be out here...
If you could conjure that portal out of thin air, she'll be coming for you.
It's a-- a different kind of portal.
See, the one you made  has put a target on your back,
but this will take you home.
Are you mad? You can't let them have her.
As I said, sold. Four marks.
The woman's a witch. You know what they will do.
Wh-Where in Cintra did you live?
I haven't spoken to anybody in three days.
I'm supposed to be going towards someone,
but instead,  I'm running from someone else.
this big bird on his head.
I don't know what he wants from me.
I can't be caught by him.
Look, it's the Cintran flag. Come on, we're saved.
♪ That will fill you with horror ♪
I'm so glad that I could bring you all together like this.
I love the way you just... sit in the corner and brood.
No one else hesitated to comment on the quality of my performance, except...
You don't want to keep a man with...
You must have some review for me. Three words or less.
You're the Witcher, Geralt of Rivia.
A job I've got for ya. I beg you.
A devil-- he's been stealing all our grain.
In advance, I'll pay you. A hundred ducat.
I've no doubt you'll come through.
You take no prisoners, so I hear.
Ah. Need a hand? I've got two.
One for each of the, uh, devil's horns.
I won't be but silent back-up.
I heard your note, and, yes, you're right,
maybe real adventures  would make better stories.
And you, sir, smell chock-full of them.
Amongst other things. I mean, what is that? Is that onion?
It doesn't matter. Whatever it is,  you smell of death and destiny.
Ooh, I could be your barker,
spreading the tales of Geralt of Rivia,
Do you know how many people  wouldn't blink if you died?
[sobs] You should've let me die. At least I had control over that.
You weren't taking control. You were losing it.
Be in the greenhouse in 20 minutes.
And you are right to be afraid.
Chaos is the most dangerous thing in this world.
It is all around us all the time.
showed an aptitude for channeling it.
Your conduit moment  created a new ripple in chaos,
Anica, you saved a drowning boy  with your mind.
But just because you are conduits of chaos...
does not mean that you are capable of magic.
Listen closely. Your survival depends on it.
And while oceans of mystery remain,
we have deduced that this requires two things.
Without them, chaos will kill you.
This is the simplest of trials
to see whether  you are worthy of the ascension.
Between your flower and your stone lies the balance.
Lift your stone without touching it.
There is no conjuring something from nothing.
There is a give and a take.
You've lost a lot of blood, piglet.
Sometimes a flower is just a flower...
and the best thing it can do for us is to die.
You were right. She found me.
It's good to meet you properly...
Don't touch me. This food was provided by the queen.
Ziven Ozol. He clothes Cintra's finest.
You look like you've been through hell.
Doing my part to avenge human lives lost in Filavandrel's uprising.
Last year, he tried to claim Cintran land.
My brother got an arrow in the brain.
Every day, I make sure his death's not in vain.
Mother, I brought someone to join us.
Look at you in your little cloak.
Fighting to defend that wretched bitch and her wretched family.
Mother, stop.  It wasn't Queen Calanthe's fault.
Nilfgaard only got past Cintran borders because of elven spies.
Technically, it was the elves' land first.
Our brother died for that land.
And your father died for Calanthe's selfishness.
Robbing us of our homes,  our men, and our lives.
I'll have enough coin to rebuild our house.
I have to apprentice, but I'll be ready when Cintra rises again.
Let's get you a fresh pair, why don't we?
Don't worry. He's one of the clean ones.
[bard] Reading between the lines and the gut punches, chum,
I'd say you have got  a bit of a... an image problem.
Were I to join you on this...
feat to defeat the devil of Posada,
I could relieve you of that title.
All the North would be too busy singing the tales of...
Geralt of Rivia,  the-the White Wolf or-or something.
Mind if I hop up? I'm not wearing the right footwear.
The elves called this Dol Blathanna before bequeathing it to the humans
and retreating into their golden palaces in the mountains.
There I go again, just... delivering exposition.
What are we looking for again?
Yeah, I don't really go in for that.  Have you ever hunted a devil before?
Obviously. Then, uh... then what are we doing?
Sometimes there's monsters, sometimes there's money.
What was that?  Looks like a tiny cannonball from a...
I have to see this magical, this mythi--
What happened with you? Your mother fuck a goat?
I am Torque the Sylvan, a rare and intelligent creature!
who left our food filled with iron meant to poison me!
Did your mother fuck a snowman?
You are intelligent, I'll give you that.
So I won't kill you, but you can't stay here.
Look until a door becomes a window.
Seek to understand your partner's greatest fears.
Thought transference should flow through you,
like learning to dance or swim or kiss.
Come on, you can do it.
You take weeks to lift your stone.
You struggle to perform the simplest physical tasks.
And now you lie to me?
Your worst fear makes such sense.
Even if you were a beauty, still, no one would love you.
I've been here for weeks and can barely do shit.
See, my thought transference trial at Ban Ard took... three days.
Boy I was paired with had a phobia of cheese.
I want to be good. Good at something.
Great. Is that what you're doing?
You can read me, if you like.
Are these the things you love?
These are the things I thought you would love.
What about your mother or your father?
My parents died when I was a baby.
My grandmother took care of me.
We take care of our own.
Tor Lara, the Tower of the Gull.
The most potent place on the continent.
Off-limits, except to the Brotherhood of Sorcerers.
to control  the ultimate expression of chaos.
[Tissaia]  Sabrina, show these girls how it's done.
What you did there  was pathetic and dangerous.
There are mages like Sabrina who ignore their emotions.
And then there are mages like us who are consumed by them.
Your first night here at Aretuza, you tried to kill yourself.
And tonight, you almost killed someone else.
It is your job to control chaos, not become it.
But if I send you to advise a king,
and your precious little feelings get hurt when he won't listen,
and you submit to chaos, he dies, his people turn on us.
You succumb to emotion, to weakness.
Do you actually have what it takes?
This is the part where we escape.
This is the part where they kill us.
Oi, that's my lute. Give that back.
My Elder speech is rough. I only got part of that.
[in Elder]  Ah, got it, thanks so much.
Do you wanna die right now?
You don't deserve the air you breathe.
You hide in your golden palaces.
You beat a bound man, too scared to even look him in the eye!
Do you like my palace? Hmm?
Does it live up to the tales you humans tell?
He's Filavandrel, King of the Elves.
Not a king. Not by choice.
I felt for them. They were forced out of Dol Blathanna.
Do you know anyone that would  choose to leave their home? To starve?
To have a Sylvan steal for them?
Toruviel, no one was supposed to get hurt.
What's two humans in the ground when countless elves have died?
And you can let him go.
Then Posada will learn that we've been stealing.
you'll come out bloody and hating yourself.
that it won't be long before you follow me in death.
Yes, because they pushed us from viable soil.
Synthetically enhanced so humans can make magic.
Chaos is the same as it's always been.
You say adapt, and I say destroy.
You're cutting off your ear  to spite your face.
You think this is about pride?
My elders worked with humans and got robbed of all they had.
And when they fought back, they were slaughtered.
The Great Cleansing," humans call it."
I called it digging a mass grave for everyone I loved.
And now the humans  proudly watch these very fields grow...
our babies fertilizer for their grain.
I don't wish to bury anyone else.
I was once  Filavandrel of the Silver Towers.
Now I'm Filavandrel of the Edge of the World.
If I bring my people down from these mountains,
it would mean  bowing to human sovereignty.
Show the humans that you are  more than what they fear you to be.
I have learned to live with them.
There are others. A new generation.
Let us take back what's ours.
I'm gonna be sent home. We'll never see each other again.
What do you mean, we'll never see each other again?
No, no. This-This is not the last time. We-- We'll find a way.
W-With one of those extra-special portals?
I wish I could show you, but I-I can't risk the knowledge
It's not the method of magic we're taught. It's older. It's more potent.
It could open doors  that can't be closed again.
Do you know whose skulls these are?
No, no. This was before humans.
Elves are the original sorcerers of the continent.
When humans and monsters all arrived after the Conjunction of the Spheres...
elven mages taught the first humans how to turn chaos into magic.
And then...  the humans slaughtered them...
so they could pretend the power had always belonged to them.
Rewriting history  with the stories we tell...
the songs we sing  about our own triumphs, it's what we do.
But I want to honor them.
Feainnewedd only grows where elder blood has spilled.
How did-How did you do that  on your first try?
Do you remember the Great Cleansing?
His blood is... why I'm cursed with a twisted spine.
Why I'm only worth four marks.
Why no one could ever love me.
[Yennefer] What will you do with it?
that you could control your emotions and get it from the boy.
Does this mean I get to ascend?
You've been working on her for months.
You must be able to give me something.
Find Adon and Zeke. And take this.
You stupid little shit! Pick it up and go!
You turned my friend into a slug.
Come. Push your friend into the pool.
I took away her control, but she still has power.
Sometimes the best thing a flower can do for us is die.
That whole reverse-psychology thing  you did on them was brilliant, by the way.
They just let us go, and you give  all of Nettly's coin to the elves.
Filavandrel's lute  not gift enough for you?
Yeah, she is a bit sexy, isn't she?
I do have respect for Filavandrel.
He survived the Great Cleansing once. Who knows? Maybe he can do it again.
This is where we part ways,  bard, for good.
I promised to change the public's tune  about you. At least allow me to try.
